Acronyms

Title
A-CDM - Airport Collaborative Decision-Making
ACC - Area Control Centre
ACE - Benchmarking Report
ACI - Airports Council International
ADEP - Aerodrome of Departure
ADES - Aerodrome of Destination
AFIL - Air filed (flight plan)
AIP - Aeronautical Information Publication
AIRAC - Aeronautical Information Regulation And Control
AIS - Aeronautical Information Service
ALDT - Actual Landing Time
ALoS - Acceptable Level of Safety
ALoSP - Acceptable Level of Safety Performance
AMAN - Arrival MANagement
AMC - Airspace Management Cell
ANS - Air Navigation Service
ANSP - Air Navigation Services Provider
AOBT - Actual Off-Block Time
APDF - Airport Operator Data Flow
APP - Approach Control Office
ASBU - Aviation System Block Upgrade
ASM - AirSpace Management
ASMA - Arrival Sequencing and Metering Area
AST - Annual Summary Template
ATC - Air Traffic Control
ATCO - Air Traffic Control Officer
ATFCM - Air Traffic Flow and Capacity Management
ATFM - Air Traffic Flow Management
ATM - Air Traffic Management
ATM-S - ATM Specific Occurrences
ATS - Air Traffic Service
AUA - Air traffic control Unit Airspace
BA - Business Aviation
BADA - Base of Aircraft Data
BLI - Basic Load Index
CAA - Civil Aviation Authority
CAEP - Committee on Aviation Environmental Protection
CASA - Computer-Assisted Slot Allocation
CAT - Commercial Air Transport
CCO - Continuous Climb Operation
CDA - Continuous Descent Approach
CDM - Collaborative Decision Making
CDO - Continuous Descent Operation
CDR - ConDitional Route
CNS - Communications, Navigation, Surveillance
CODA - Central Office for Delay Analysis
CPF - Correlated Position reports for a Flight
CPR - Correlated Position Report
CRCO - Central Route Charges Office
CRI - Composite Risk Index
CRInorm - Composite Risk Index normalised
CTFM - Current Tactical Flight Model
CTOT - Calculated Take-Off Time
DCT - DireCT route
DDI-G - Delay Difference Indicator - Group
DDR2 - Demand data repository, version 2
DF - Distance Factor
EASA - European Union Aviation Safety Agency
EC - European Commission
ECAC - European Civil Aviation Conference
EOBT - Estimated Off-Block Time
ERNIP - European Route Network Improvement Plan
ESRA - EUROCONTROL Statistical Reference Area
ESSIP - European Single Sky ImPlementation plan
ETFMS - Enhanced Tactical Flow Management System
ETOT - Estimated Take-Off Time
ETS - Emissions Trading Scheme
EUACA - European Airport Coordinators Association
EoSM - Effectiveness of Safety Management
FAB - Functional Airspace Block
FIR - Flight Information Region
FL - Flight Level
FMP - Flow Management Position
FRA - Free Route Airspace
FTFM - Filed Tactical Flight Model
FUA - Flexible Use of Airspace
GA - General Aviation
GANP - Global Air Navigation Plan
GAT - General Air Traffic
GCD - Great-Circle Distance
GTO - Ground Time Overshoot
IATA - International Air Transport Association
ICAO - International Civil Aviation Organization
IFPS - Initial Flight Plan Processing System
IFR - Instrument Flight Rules
IMC - Instrument Meteorological Conditions
JC - Just culture
KEA - Key performance Environment indicator based on Actual trajectory
KEP - Key performance Environment indicator based on last filed flight Plan
KPA - Key Performance Area
KPI - Key Performance Indicator
LAQ - Local Air Quality
LOBT - Last received Off-Block Time
LSSIP - Local Single Sky ImPlementation plans/reports
LTO - Landing and Take-off cycle
M1 - Model 1 trajectory
M3 - Model 3 trajectory
MET - METeorological services for air navigation
METAR - METeorological Aerodrome or Aeronautical Report
MTOW - Maximum Take-Off Weight
NM - Nautical Mile
NM - Network Manager
NOP - Network Operations Plan
NOTAM - NOTices to AirMen
OAG - Official Airline Guide (OAG)
OAT - Operational Air Traffic
OBT - Off-Block Time
OEW - Operating Empty Weight
PFD - Planned Flight Data
PI - Performance Indicator
PLI - Peak Load Index
PRC - Performance Review Commission
PRISME - Pan European Repository of Information Supporting the Management of EATM
PRR - Performance Review Report
PRU - Performance Review Unit
RAD - Route Availability Document
RAT - Risk Analysis Tool Methodology
RI - Runway Incursion
RP1 - Reference Period 1
RP2 - Reference Period 2
RP3 - Reference Period 3
RVSM - Reduced Vertical Separation Minima
SCR - Shortest Constrained Route
SES - Single European Sky
SESAR - Single European Sky ATM Research programme
SID - Standard Instrument Departure
SM - Separation Minima
SMI - Separation Minima Infringement
SMS - Safety Management System
SOBT - Scheduled Off-Block Time
SRC - Safety Regulation Commission
SRR - Shortest RAD restrictions applied Route
SSC - Single Sky Committee
SSP - State Safety Programme
STAM - Short Term ATFCM Measures
STAR - Standard Arrival Route
STATFOR - Statistics and Forecast Service
SU - Service Unit
SUA - Special Use Airspace
SUR - Shortest Unconstrained Route
TBS - Time Based Separation
TCZ - Terminal Charging Zone
TDI - Turnaround Delay Indicator
TMA - Terminal Manoeuvring Area
TNC - Terminal Navigation Charges
TNSU - Terminal Navigation Service Units
TOBT - Target Off-Block Time
TRA - Temporary Reserved Area
TSA - Temporary Segregated Area
TWR - ToWeR
UAC - Upper Area Control centre
UPA - Unauthorised Penetration of Airspace
USOAP - Universal Safety Oversight Audit Programme
VFR - Visual Flight Rules
WF - Weight Factor
XMAN - CROSS border arrival MANagement
